title: When I Went Abroad For The First Time To Meet My Long-Distance Boyfriend - Novel Updates
genre: Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Long-distance Relationship   Oneshot   Unconditional Love
author: 春与鸢
description:
What should I do if my boyfriend loves me too much?
He wrote a whole five-page detailed plan to go on a pre-wedding trip with me, eh?>
